T02D2422:38a-1: aa dva ya ni ri ka bha ba na kra ma /
T02D2422:38a-3: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa /
T02D2422:38a-4: gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2422:38a-5: mnyam pa nyid kyi klong dkyil du //
T02D2422:38a-6: myos pas dbyings su rin chen stor //
T02D2422:38a-7: kye ma rigs nyams ngo mtshar cha //
T02D2422:38a-8: mnyam nyid gnas su gnyis med 'gyur //
T02D2422:38a-9: bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas //
T02D2422:38a-10: ni la kha na dhas mtshams su 'joms //
T02D2422:38a-11: bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas //
T02D2422:38a-12: dge slong gis ni mtshams su 'joms //
T02D2422:38a-13: gnyis med sems ni gnyis med 'gyur //
T02D2422:38a-14: mkha' yi bdag nyid mgul nas mkhyud //
T02D2422:38a-15: bdag gzhan brje ba'i khyad par byas //
T02D2422:38a-16: gnyen 'dun thams cad rlag par byas //
T02D2422:38a-17: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
T02D2422:38a-18: ni la khan dhas mtshams su 'joms //
T02D2422:38a-19: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
T02D2422:38a-20: dge sbyong gis ni mtshams su 'joms //
T02D2422:38a-21: gzhon nu lo ni bcu gnyis ma //
T02D2422:38a-22: ci yang bdag gis rtogs pa med //
T02D2422:38a-23: rnal 'byor kun gyi byed gnas pas //
T02D2422:38a-25: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
T02D2422:38a-26: ni la khan dhas mtshams su 'joms //
T02D2422:38a-27: dung dang gser dang dngul dag kyang //
T02D2422:38a-28: gcig kyang bdag la dgos pa med //
T02D2422:38b-1: he ru ka la 'khyud pa yis //
T02D2422:38b-2: bdag gi rgyal srid ngo mtshar che //
T02D2422:38b-3: nam mkha' deng rtser chags pa la //
T02D2422:38b-4: sus kyang ma mthong ngo mtshar che //
T02D2422:38b-6: he ru ka dang 'khyud nas gnas //
T02D2422:38b-7: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa zhes bya ba slob
T02D2422:38b-8: dpon nag po nas brgyud pa slob dpon ni la
